name: MEN'S TIMEX EXPEDITION DIGITAL COMPASS WATCH T49612
description:
Constructed with the great outdoors in mind, this Expedition Trail series Shock is a watch that goes far beyond telling time.

- Indiglo® night-light with Night-Mode

- Accurate digital compass with displays heading in degrees and sixteen cardinal points and digital compass needle

- Shock-Resistant to ISO Standards

- 100-hour chronograph with 99-lap counter and split times

- Water-resistant to 660 feet (200 M)

name: 5.11 TRIAB 18 TACTICAL SLINGPACK
description:
[PURPOSE BUILT]

The TRIAB 18 is a versatile one strap sling bag designed to provide field support on tactical missions, but doubles as a utility pack suited to a wide range of applications. Rugged, durable, and lightweight, the TRIAB 18 sling bag features a generous wrap-around MOLLE/SlickStick™ compatible web platform for customized storage, a reinforced grab-and-go handle for quick deployment, and a covert TacTec™ quick access pistol pocket sized for a sidearm. The large main compartment of the TRIAB sling bag is roomy enough for all your gear, and offers multiple internal admin pockets to keep your smaller accessories organized. A slot pocket at the rear accommodates a hydration bladder or an armor plate, and a double zip shove-it pocket offers expandable storage on demand.

- See more at: http://www.511tactical.com/triab-18.html#sthash.dKqrrUWi.dpuf


[OVERVIEW]

Quick and reliable tactical sling bag
Generous MOLLE/SlickStick web platform
Reinforced grab-and-go handle
TacTec compatible covert pistol pocket
Hydration bladder/armor plate slot
Roomy main compartment
Multiple organizer pockets
Double zip shove-it pocket

 
[SPECIFICATIONS]

Durable 1050D nylon
20" H x 14" L x 7" D main compartment
Complements the 5.11 BROKOS belt
Adjustable padded shoulder strap
Padded compression straps
- See more at: http://www.511tactical.com/triab-18.html#sthash.dKqrrUWi.dpuf

name: CRKT KEN ONION PARASAW PARACORD BRACELET
description:
Having a length of cordage along on your next great outdoor excursion is never a bad idea; cleverly adding in a handy cable saw for the unexpected couldn't hurt either.
Ken Onion applied his passion for creating useful tools, and his personal love of the outdoors, in designing the Onion Survival Para-Saw™. It is 8 to 9 foot length (depending on size ordered) of nylon paracord that's braided into a bracelet form—with a plastic encased, tungsten carbide coated wire saw woven into the braided cord.

In the emergency survival event that you had to use the cordage and/or wire saw, you simply unravel the bracelet. The Para-Saw™ paracord survival bracelet uses a quick release buckle to easily secure it on your wrist, or on your gear.

Now you can have along two very handy survival tools, in one easy to travel package! Cordage for securing, lashing, or paring down for other uses and an effective wire saw to cut limbs, wood, or any number of things in a survival situation.

If you are the type that gets outdoors, be prepared. These are a must have!

Available in two sizes/lengths and colors including desert camo, green, and black.

name: NOMADS RULE [ORIGINAL] T-SHIRT
description:
A great T-Shirt for the range, the gym, or just an average day out. This t-shirt evokes fun, strength, endurance, and a willingness to try anything new.

Available in sizes S-3XL

*Printed on Gildan Ultra Cotton

name: NOMADS RULE [BADGE] T-SHIRT
description:
This great contrast of charcoal and lime green allows this T-Shirt to really POP! Featuring our alternate iconic logo of the crossed hatchets, this t-shirt begs to be worn in the great outdoors, or anywhere that begs a challenge.

Available in sizes S-3XL

*Printed on Gildan Ultra Cotton

name: SCHRADE SCHF10 CARBON STEEL FIXED BLADE
description:
Schrade Extreme Survival Full Tang Fixed Blade, Black 8Cr13MoV High Carbon Stainless Steel Drop Point Blade with Jimping, Ergonomic Multi-Directional Textured Micarta Overlay Handle Slabs with Spine and Grip Jimping, Lanyard Hole, and Ballistic Belt Sheath with Storage Pouch.


Overall Length: 10.6"(26.8cm)
Handle Length: 5.3"(13.4cm)
Blade Length: 5.3"(13.4cm)
Weight: 14.6 oz.
U.P.C.: 044356217125
